entry.title: GOVERNOR DECLARES EMERGENCY DUE TO SEVERE FLOODING IN SOUTHEASTERN OREGON
entry.summary: March 29, 2025 5:50 p.m. On Saturday, Governor Tina Kotek declared an emergency due to severe flooding in southeastern Oregon. Kotek said, “Floodwaters in Harney County and on the Burns Paiute Reservation have created serious public health and environmental hazards and they need all hands on deck. This declaration allows the state to act swiftly...

entry.title: Two Teens Critically Injured in Crash Near Sutherlin
entry.summary: Two 17-year-old girls were critically injured in a crash near Sutherlin on March 26 after their vehicle collided with a truck towing an excavator. The teens were transferred to Portland hospitals. The truck driver sustained minor injuries and cooperated with the investigation.
